term.title: heat capacity of activation

item.text: A quantity related to the temperature coefficient of Δ‡H (enthalpy of activation) and Δ‡S (entropy of activation) according to the equations: Δ‡Cp = (∂Δ‡H/∂T)p = T(∂Δ‡S/∂T)p.
